attributes.title: Ew
attributes.review: This is the worst app possible my phone crashes every time I open it and it takes up so much space on my phone I’m pretty sure my phone is broken because of this app

attributes.title: Trinity
attributes.review: This app was super glitchy to me and I think it does not have the things that I thought was going to be inside of the app. All of his plans are terrible and I am super dissatisfied and I think that trump does not deserve an app. Thank you.

attributes.title: Wat the f0ck is this 👁💋👁🖕🏻
attributes.review: Ok so I got this app and all I’ve seen is people taking dumps and THATS Unacceptable so I gave it a one star on purpose, ALSO I saw that it had a lot of adds of Peolpe twerking on the highway. Like my child is on this app, so this needs to be stoped right now

attributes.title: Do not recommend
attributes.review: This app is not very well made. Do not recommend downloading it. I am not sure why they want my mobile phone number, do not trust it. Better luck next time.

attributes.title: This app made me sick
attributes.review: The second I downloaded this app it stole all my personal info!! Now it’s giving it to the America government! That’s worse than what TikTok does. Then right after, the app called me stupid and bullied me. It told me to die.

attributes.title: i’m terrified
attributes.review: when i opened the app , this orange man appeared with a blue suit .. i didn’t know who it was ... it kinda looked like an orange creamsicle .. i was with my parents and i jumped because my soul left my body ... they said to me why r u scared? i said bcs this oompa loompa spray tan dude appeared on my screen ... anyways after that the app started harassing me to make a profile to vote for the oompa loompa dude . i feel so harassed .. i started crying 0/10 would not recommend getting this app 🙁

attributes.title: This app was too hard to use
attributes.review: 🙄🙄🙄 I couldn’t figure out how to use any of it just like I can’t figure out how Americans would actually want Trump as president. Why does this app exist if no one can use it? Get rid of the app, Cheeto face. 😀✨

attributes.title: made me rethink my life 🤢
attributes.review: opening and using this app was the worst part of my day. I was having an alright time, but it all went down hill once I opened the app. such a waste of space on my phone 😌😌

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: This isn’t a good app. It’s disorganized, crashes, has caused the rest of my phone to slow down. It’s horrible, takes up too much space, and doesn’t do what it said it would. I hate it 💫💫

attributes.title: Not good
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see Trump’s campaign, and it makes me put a mobile phone number in! I don’t have a mobile number, so I can’t even use the app😡😡 very unsatisfied. I will not be recommending to anyone
